mapper.select: SELECT HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE,HP.HP_POSTCODE,HP.HP_ADDRESS, HP.HP_X, HP.HP_Y,HP.HP_REVIEW, HP.HP_AVG_RATE, NVL(HT.HP_TIME,'정보없음') AS HP_TIME FROM HPLIKE HL LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL HP ON(HL.HP_NO = HP.HP_NO) LEFT JOIN HPTIME HT ON(HL.HP_NO = HT.HP_UNIQUENO) WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DAY') = HT.HP_DAY AND C_NO =#{cNo} ORDER BY HL.HP_NO DESC

SELECT PR.PDREVIEW_CONTENT, PR.ORDER_NO, PR.PD_NO, PA.ORDER_DATE,PD.PD_NAME,PR.PDREVIEW_NO FROM PRODUCTREVIEW PR JOIN PAYMENT PA ON(PR.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=PR.PD_NO) WHERE PR.C_NO=#{cNo} ORDER BY PA.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.PAYMENT_WAY,PA.USE_POINT,PA.C_NO,OP.PD_NO,OP.OP_COUNT,PD.PD_NAME, PD.THUMBNAIL,OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORIGIN_PRICE-SELL_PRICE+PA.USE_POINT,'999,999,999') AS DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) WHERE PA.C_NO =#{cNo} ORDER BY PA.ORDER_DATE DESC
